turns.content: Hi! My name is Sarah and I'm a software engineer.
Hello Sarah! It's great to meet a fellow software engineer. What technologies do you work with?
I mainly work with Python and TypeScript. I also have a dog named Max.
Python and TypeScript are a great combination! And Max sounds like a lovely companion.

facts.content: User works with Python and TypeScript
User has a dog named Max

turns.content: Actually, I've switched to mainly using Rust now instead of Python.
That's interesting! Rust is known for its performance and safety. What prompted the switch?
I joined a new team that focuses on systems programming.

facts.content: User now mainly uses Rust instead of Python
User joined a new team doing systems programming
